page.title: 12ECOLOGY
page.content: THE CEULAN AND LERI RIVERS. There are only two rivers running through our block, the Ceulan and the Leri rivers. They are comparitively small rivers yet have at one time been very important in the industrial life of the area. there was until about two years ago a Woollen Mill on the river Leri which used the water for power and for washing.The Leri Mill produced all types of woollen products, the most popular being the 'garthen' which is a tapestry used as a bed covering. These have been exported all over the World. The Ceulan Mill which used the Ceulan river finished producing about 20 years ago but during the early part of this century was the main source of employment in the area.
